graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:QueueManagerCreateQueueInput!)
{
	queueManagerCreateQueue (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		prefix
		name
		waitingJobs
		activeJobs
		completedJobs
		failedJobs
		delayedJobs
		pausedJobs
	}
}

graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	queueManagerGetQueues (query: $query)
	{
		id
		prefix
		name
		waitingJobs
		activeJobs
		completedJobs
		failedJobs
		delayedJobs
		pausedJobs
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	queueManagerFindQueue (query: $query)
	{
		id
		prefix
		name
		waitingJobs
		activeJobs
		completedJobs
		failedJobs
		delayedJobs
		pausedJobs
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	queueManagerFindQueueById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		prefix
		name
		waitingJobs
		activeJobs
		completedJobs
		failedJobs
		delayedJobs
		pausedJobs
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:QueueManagerUpdateQueueInput!)
{
	queueManagerUpdateQueue (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		prefix
		name
		waitingJobs
		activeJobs
		completedJobs
		failedJobs
		delayedJobs
		pausedJobs
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	queueManagerDeleteQueueById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		prefix
		name
		waitingJobs
		activeJobs
		completedJobs
		failedJobs
		delayedJobs
		pausedJobs
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	queueManagerDeleteQueues (query: $query)
	{
		id
		prefix
		name
		waitingJobs
		activeJobs
		completedJobs
		failedJobs
		delayedJobs
		pausedJobs
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
